document_data.name: Silverhand chaka
document_data.mainbody: The '''Silverhand chaka''' was a prominent [[chaka]] within the [[Shining Lands]] of [[southeast Faer√ªn]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]] and a member of the [[Chakas of 31]].
document_data.Base of Operations: The Silverhand chaka was based in the city of [[Ulara (town)|Ulara]] in northwest [[Estagund]].
document_data.Activity: They were rare among the chakas of the region in that they were an organization of [[dwarves]]. Their wealth came from the [[silver]] mines within the nearby [[Thrulaliel Mountains]].
